name: Dungeon Wanderer (Monstr)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 45 Compo: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/dungeon-wanderer

You need to explore the map collecting weapons and making sure not to die. Try and find the boss sign and press SPACE to summon the boss!

WASD = Move | Mouse Click = Attack/Fire Mouse = Aim | Mouse Scroll = Switch Weapon

Swords, Axes, Bows & health potions are in the game.

(I Can only test the Windows version but hopefully the other versions work too)
